timeline.message: Make working with process variables easier
Migrate string/int/bool variables to new mechanism

timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: I'll delete them, but in a future commit.
replies.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Where is this defined and wasn't it VariableHandler?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: In the first commit. I decided to make it static, since in a lot of listeners, I had to create new instances of VariableHandler in multiple places and it just did not seem like an improvement.
replies.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: How null values are handled? Will there be a problem if a null value is provided?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: Null values are handled in the serializers currently. I'll think about moving the handling here, though, as it seems like a good idea.
replies.author: nictas
